text: Shizunai District in Hidaka Subprefecture before merging with Mitsuishi District in 2006. was a district located in Hidaka Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. In 2004, the district had an estimated population of 22,581 and a density of 28.17 persons per km². The total area was 801.51 km². On March 31, 2006, Shizunai District merged with Mitsuishi District to create the newly created Hidaka District. Mitsuishi District and Shizunai District were both dissolved with this merger. ==Towns and villages== * Shizunai Category:Former districts of Hokkaido
title: Shizunai District, Hokkaido
